Title: Scarf
Actors: Bonsun Koo, Jamie Bernadette, Alyssa Carpenter, Skylar Ripp
Plot: Allan, a Korean filmmaker in the U.S., goes hiking in the forest with his wife, Samantha, and she vanishes mysteriously. His drug addict, anorexic model sister- in - law Alex moves in with him to find out what happened to her.
